ISSUE.TITLE: Add tabs to sort through job templates based on Jenkins tags
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### COMPONENT NAME - UI ##### SUMMARY Add tabs at the top of the job template list that are based on Jenkins tags to allow for easier navigation of job templates.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6327 from mabashian/aap-10702-schedule-extra-vars [4.3] Fixes bug where attempting to edit a schedule with stringified extra_data threw error

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #6289 from mabashian/6282-login-autocomplete [4.3] Turn off auto completion on the login form
